text: Raymond John Barry (born March 14, 1939) is an American actor. He was nominated for the Independent Spirit Award for Best Supporting Male for his role in Steel City. He also played Chester Hoenicker in Flubber. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from New York (state)
title: Raymond J. Barry
